title: Verification Methods Comparison
description: Interactive MicroSim helping students judge which verification method (Second Derivative Test, First Derivative Test, or Endpoint Comparison) is most appropriate for different optimization scenarios in calculus.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Optimization
Derivatives
Critical Points
Maximum and Minimum

scenarioSelect.description: Select from four optimization scenarios with different characteristics

methodSelect.description: Choose which verification method to apply

applyButton.description: Apply the selected method to analyze the current scenario

compareButton.description: Show all three methods simultaneously for comparison
